column1: ##DESCRIPTION=cnv_type=Type of CNV: focal (< 25 % of chrom. arm, < 3 genes), cluster (focal, > 3 genes), (partial) p/q-arm, (partial) chromosome.
##DESCRIPTION=CGI_genes=Genes which were included in CancerGenomeInterpreter.org analysis.
##DESCRIPTION=CGI_driver_statement=Driver statement for cancer type CANCER according CancerGenomeInterpreter.org
##DESCRIPTION=CGI_gene_role=Gene role for cancer type CANCER according CancerGenomeInterpreter.org
##DESCRIPTION=RNA_tpm_per_gene=RNA TPM counts per gene from file an_somatic_cnvs_rna_counts.tsv.
